mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.mapreduce.output

Class GeoWaveOutputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<GeoWaveOutputKey,Object>
      • mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.mapreduce.output.GeoWaveOutputFormat

  • public class GeoWaveOutputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<GeoWaveOutputKey,Object>
    This output format is the preferred mechanism for writing data to GeoWave within a map-reduce job.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  GeoWaveOutputFormat.GeoWaveRecordWriter
      A base class to be used to create RecordWriter instances that write to Accumulo.

      • setAccumuloOperationsInfo

        public static void setAccumuloOperationsInfo(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job job,
                                             String zooKeepers,
                                             String instanceName,
                                             String userName,
                                             String password,
                                             String geowaveTableNamespace)
        Configures a AccumuloOperations for this job.
        Parameters:
        job - the Hadoop job instance to be configured
        zooKeepers - a comma-separated list of zookeeper servers
        instanceName - the Accumulo instance name
        userName - the Accumulo user name
        password - the Accumulo password
        geowaveTableNamespace - the GeoWave table namespace

      • getAccumuloOperations

        public static AccumuloOperations getAccumuloOperations(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobContext context)
                                                throws org.apache.accumulo.core.client.AccumuloException,
                                                       org.apache.accumulo.core.client.AccumuloSecurityException
        Determines whether tables are permitted to be created as needed.
        Parameters:
        context - the Hadoop context for the configured job
        Returns:
        true if the feature is disabled, false otherwise
        Throws:
        org.apache.accumulo.core.client.AccumuloException
        org.apache.accumulo.core.client.AccumuloSecurityException
        See Also:
        #setCreateTables(Job, boolean)
